metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14045 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The FIRFilter::evaluateFilterMulti function in FIRFilter.cpp in libSoundTouch.a in Olli Parviainen SoundTouch 2.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and application exit), as demonstrated by SoundStretch.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14045` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsoundtouch1 - 2.1.2+ds1-1build1
soundstretch - 2.1.2+ds1-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: soundtouch package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.2+ds1-1build1').
